coffee.name: Lucaffé Mamma Lucia
coffee.description: Lucaffé Mamma Lucia is ideal for morning coffee moments. This sweet coffee works perfectly in milk coffees, such as in your cappuccino and caffè latte. The coffee gives a rich crema.The blend consists of 40 % Arabica and 60 % Robusta beans. For a quick start in the morning!

coffee.name: Pera Super Crema
coffee.description: Pera Super Crema is a coffee for friends of traditional Italian espresso. Super Crema contains 100 % Robusta, and it has a nutty and round taste with sweetness and hints of caramel and cocoa. The coffee provides a rich crema. The amount of caffeine in the robusta is guaranteed to wake you up in the morning and keep you going in the afternoon.

coffee.name: Caffè Paskà
coffee.description: The long coffee tradition in the home town of the espresso coffee - Naples - has given inspiration to this blend of robusta and Arabica beans. Caffé Paskà is a very powerful and intense coffee, and it is a dark roast in true Neopolitan style. The coffee has a rich crema and is rich in flavour due to the high proportion of Robusta beans (approx. 80 %).

coffee.name: Crema Ethiopia Sidamo
coffee.description: Ethiopia Sidamo is like the dark, warm nights of Africa in your coffee cup.

coffee.name: Crema Royalty Blend
coffee.description: This dignified coffee blend contains Indian Monsooned Malabar coffee, which is perfectly full-bodied in nature and has a really low acidity. In addition, this royal blend includes Colombia Excelso coffee which is blissfully fruity and has a delicious taste of sweet caramel.

coffee.name: Passalacqua Mehari
coffee.description: Passalacqua is a family roastery in Naples. The roastery is known for its dark roasted, spicy coffees and Mehari is no exception. It is a strong and full-bodied espresso that will taste great even in milk coffees

coffee.name: Crema Brazil
coffee.description: The slow and smooth roast brings you a coffee with sweetness and an aftertaste of caramel. You can also find tones of dark chocolate in the coffee. Crema Brazil can be enjoyed with or without milk. Why don't you go ahead and have another cup!

coffee.name: Miscela d'Oro Gran Crema
coffee.description: Miscela d'Oro Gran Crema is an espresso coffee roasted in Sicily, with an intense flavor and a thick crema. The flavor is balanced and smooth, pleasantly creamy on the palate, malty sweetness with vibrant notes of roasted nuts, biscuit and whisky.

coffee.name: Lucaffé Classic
coffee.description: Lucaffé Classic is a round, smooth and versatile espresso blend, which appeals to most people. The high quality blend contains 80 % Arabica and 20 % Robusta. Enjoy as an espresso or in milk coffees.

coffee.name: Caffi Yellow Bourbon Brasilia
coffee.description: Caffi Yellow Bourbon is the favorite coffee of many, and not without a reason. This sweet and chocolaty top quality coffee is cultivated in Minas Gerais, Brazil. The coffee is balanced and offers a good cup with all preparation method

machine.name: 9Barista Espresso Machine
machine.description: 9Barista produces professional quality espresso by using a new, patented technology that sets it apart from all other espresso machines. At its heart is a unique twin-boiler system. One boiler sets the brewing pressure, while the second regulates the brewing temperature.

machine.name: Wilfa Svart Performance
machine.description: Wilfa Svart Performance WSPL-3B is not just a new coffee maker - it is the coffee maker designed in Norway, in collaboration with barista world champion Tim Wendelboe.

machine.name: Bellman CX-25P Espresso Maker
machine.description: The Bellman CX-25P Espresso Maker makes espresso using the steam method, that is akin to the stove top espresso you get from a moka pot.

machine.name: Flair 58 Base Model
machine.description: Flair 58 is a fully-manual, professional grade, lever espresso press that is focused on maximizing the workflow and the espresso from at-home extractions.

machine.name: Rancilio Silvia E V6
machine.description: The latest Rancilio Silvia model E V60 2020 has a built-in power saving function, which ensures that the espresso machine does not use unnecessary power.

machine.name: Flair NEO Flex
machine.description: For beginner home baristas, the Flair NEO Flex espresso maker is an ideal choice. With two different portafilters, it offers the option of either fast and easy or more precise brewing, minimizing the requirement for additional equipment and streamlining the dial-in process. It provides a budget-friendly and straightforward espresso experience.

machine.name: DeLonghi BCO421.S
machine.description: DeLonghi BCO421.S combines an espresso machine and a drip coffee maker. You can prepare espresso, cappuccino and filter coffee with the same machine.

machine.name: ROK EspressoGC
machine.description: Iconic design and engineering lets you easily pull a perfect double espresso, the core of many coffee drinks. Ditch the electric pump and feel the coffee extraction. Great taste, great experience. Sustainable.

machine.name: CASO Coffee Compact
machine.description: Fresh and aromatic coffee inspires the senses. Only by fresh grinding, the bean cells and the intense aroma of the coffee beans are released.
